backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing access-controlled user profiles, quick-buy lists, and schedules with basic CRUD operations and permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related source files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing MapView, i18n utilities, and global theme styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables and themes for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/README.md: Frontend overview documenting features, setup requirements, and capabilities of the Smart Shopping Planner.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component wiring authentication, user profile setup, planner form, shop discovery, recommendations, and schedule export UI.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header component showing app branding, language toggle, and login/logout controls using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/CategoryMappingE: UI component allowing users to assign categories to items for improved shop relevance ranking.
frontend/src/components/CostSummary.tsx: Displays estimated total cost, budget status, and top cost items with editable price overrides.
frontend/src/components/DemoModeToggle.t: Toggles demo mode and loads predefined sample location and items when enabled.
frontend/src/components/DiscoveryPanel.t: Manages shop discovery using selected provider, category filtering, and toggles between list or map views.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Shows a fallback message when no shops are found and provides a retry button.
frontend/src/components/ExportPanel.tsx: Exports schedule data to ICS or PDF, saves schedules, and includes cost summary and notes editing.
frontend/src/components/ItemsEditor.tsx: Allows adding, removing, and voice‑dictating shopping list items.
frontend/src/components/LanguageToggle.t: Switches the app language between English and Hindi.
frontend/src/components/MapView.tsx: Renders an embedded map with shop markers and selectable shop cards.
frontend/src/components/PastSchedulesDra: Drawer component that lists past schedules, allows cloning and deleting schedules, and displays key details like location, date, items, and budget.
frontend/src/components/PlannerForm.tsx: Form for creating a shopping plan, handling location, datetime, items, geolocation, validation, and access to past schedules.
Displays price comparisons across shops, highlights the cheapest option, and computes totals using compareShopPrices.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog for initial user profile setup that saves a user's name through a backend mutation with validation and feedback.
frontend/src/components/QuickBuyList.tsx: Shows a quick-pick list of common or user-defined items, allowing one-click addition to the planner.
frontend/src/components/RecommendationsP: Displays top-ranked shop recommendations with visit-time suggestions and lets users select a shop.
frontend/src/components/ShopsList.tsx: Renders a list of shops with details like rating, distance, and status, and supports selecting a shop.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGeolocation.ts: Provides a helper for requesting the user's geolocation with loading state and formatted results.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login state and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for profiles, schedules, and quick-buy lists with caching and mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechToText.ts: Custom hook that wraps Web Speech API to provide speech‑to‑text with start/stop controls and transcript state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining base styles and an India-inspired light/dark color palette using CSS variables.
frontend/src/lib/categories.ts: Utility for inferring item categories based on defaults or user mappings.
frontend/src/lib/costing.ts: Functions for estimating item costs, finding highest‑cost items, and comparing shop totals using simple heuristics.
frontend/src/lib/demoData.ts: Provides demo location, items, and example shop data with metadata for testing or mock UI.
frontend/src/lib/exports/ics.ts: Generates and downloads an ICS calendar file for a shopping schedule event.
frontend/src/lib/exports/pdf.ts: Creates an HTML-based printable PDF window for a shopping schedule with cost and shop details.
frontend/src/lib/geo.ts: Distance and ETA utilities using haversine formula and assumed city travel speed.
frontend/src/lib/i18n.tsx: Defines bilingual English/Hindi translation strings and provides React context helpers for language selection.
frontend/src/lib/providers/placesProvide: Implements shop discovery via demo data, OSM, or Google, returning normalized shop results with distance, ETA, and status.
frontend/src/lib/scheduling.ts: Provides utilities to rank shops by openness, rating, and distance, and to suggest visit times with contextual notes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings with plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s high-level state, features, architecture, images, and requirements metadata.
